customHeadContent:
<style>
/* Medium Devices, Desktops */
@media only screen and (min-width : 768px) {
  #start-date-utc-display, #end-date-utc-display {
    margin-top:25px;
  }
}
</style>
name: Robot Definitions

elements.name: Embedded Display Mode
elements.label: Embedded Display Mode ('Advanced' or blank/any other value)

elements.name: Robot Name
elements.label: Robot Name
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Description
elements.label: Description
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Category
elements.label: Category
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Task Tree
elements.label: Task Tree Name
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Valid JSON Format Message
elements.text:
'Runtime Inputs' must be valid JSON or blank.
Example: {"input 1":"value 1","input 2":"value 2"}

elements.name: Runtime Inputs
elements.label: Runtime Inputs (JSON format)
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Notify on Run Completion Section
elements.title: Execution Notification
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Notify Upon Each Run Completion
elements.label: Notify Upon Each Run Completion
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

elements.name: Run Completion Recipient
elements.label: Recipient (Comma separated Teams, Usernames, and/or STMP Addresses)

elements.name: Recurrence GMT Note
elements.text: All recurrence information must be entered as UTC, or execution times may not be as expected.

elements.name: Interval
elements.label: Every
elements.requiredMessage: You must specify an interval for the recurrences.

elements.name: Minute Execution Note
elements.text:
Note: Recurring minute execution times are calculated from the time of the previous execution's completion.

Ex: If a recurrence is set for every 3 minutes, and a run begins at 2:05 and takes 2 minutes to complete, the next run will be scheduled for 2:10 -- 3 minutes after the completion time of 2:07.

elements.name: Timing
elements.label: On
elements.requiredMessage: Either 'On certain days of week' or 'On specific days in a month' must be selected.

choices.label: On certain days of the week
On specific dates in a month

elements.name: Months
elements.label: In which month(s)?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one month.

elements.name: Weekdays
elements.label: On which day(s) of the week?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one day of the week.

elements.name: Sunday Index
elements.label: On which Sunday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Sunday of the month.

elements.name: Monday Index
elements.label: On which Monday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Monday of the month.

elements.name: Tuesday Index
elements.label: On which Tuesday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Tuesday of the month.

elements.name: Wednesday Index
elements.label: On which Wednesday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Wednesday of the month.

elements.name: Thursday Index
elements.label: On which Thursday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Thursday of the month.

elements.name: Friday Index
elements.label: On which Friday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Friday of the month.

elements.name: Saturday Index
elements.label: On which Saturday(s) on the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one Saturday of the month.

elements.name: Days
elements.label: On which day(s) of the month?
elements.requiredMessage: You must select at least one day.

elements.name: Disclaimer
elements.text: Note: If a day is selected that does not exist for a given month, a run will not execute for that date.

elements.name: Timezone offset message
elements.text: hour(s) from your local time to calculate UTC time.

elements.name: Set to Local Time Button Container

elements.label: Set values to current time UTC
elements.name: Set to current time UTC

events.name: Set Execution Hour and Execution Minute based on user local tim
events.code:
K('field[Execution Hour]').value( moment(Date.now()).utc().format("HH") );
K('field[Execution Minute]').value( moment(Date.now()).utc().format("mm") );

elements.name: Execution Period
elements.title: Execution Period
elements.visible: values('Embedded') === null  || (values('Embedded') !== null  && values('Embedded Display Mode') === "Advanced")

events.name: Convert and populate Start Date UTC

elements.name: End Date
elements.label: End Date (Leave blank for continual execution)

events.name: Convert and populate End Date UTC

elements.name: Schedule Completion Recipient
elements.label: Recipient (Comma separated Teams, Usernames, and/or STMP Addresses)

events.name: Validate Runtime Inputs
Load Page Code
Populate Recurrence Description
